required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 10, 2022
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long-term Efficacy and Safety Study of GV-971
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Study to Evaluate the Long-term Efficacy and Safety of Sodium Oligomannate Capsules (GV-971)

brief_summary.textblock: Sodium Oligomannate Capsules (GV-971) has been approved for treatment of mild to moderate Alzheimer's disease and improving the cognitive function of patients. This study plans to observe, in the clinical patients, the long-term efficacy and safety of GV-971, as well as the changes in blood and gut microbiota biomarkers after treatment, to validate the mechanism of action of GV-971, in order to better guide the rational use of drug in clinical practice.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the ADAS-cog/11 score
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Alzheimer's Disease Assessments Scale - cognitive (ADAS-cog/11) scale total score. The total score of ADAS-cog/11 is 0-70, with higher scores mean a worse outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in ADAS-Cog/11 score
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Alzheimer's Disease Assessments Scale - cognitive (ADAS-cog/11) scale total score. The total score of ADAS-cog/11 is 0-70, with higher scores mean a worse outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in MMSE score
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Mini Mental State Examination (MMSE) score. The total score of MMSE is 0-30, with higher scores mean a better outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in ADCS-ADL score
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study - Activities of Daily Living; 23-item Scale (ACDS-ADL23) score. The total score of ADCS-ADL23 is 0-78, with higher scores mean a better outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v4.0
secondary_outcome.description: The incidence of adverse events and adverse reactions of vital signs, laboratory tests, electrocardiogram, and early withdrawal from the study in patients treated with GV-971.

arm_group.description: The recommended dose regimen for subjects: GV-971 450 mg (3 capsules) per dose, bid, po. in morning and evening

intervention.description: Sodium Oligomannate Capsules, each capsule contains 150 mg of sodium oligomannate. The recommended treatment is oral administration, 450 mg (3 capsules) per dose, bid, in morning and evening.
